conbody.p: As an operator, you can use the application in the to access the operations associated with a work order. Each row in the Operations page represents an operation to be performed or has been completed. By default, the application contains the operations of the Machine that you select.

You can perform the following tasks in the application:
Access an operation
Clock on an operation
Clock off an operation
Access a quality variable
Access an instruction document associated with the operation
Access a list of BOM parts associated with a lot
Consume a lot during production
Create a lot
Create a defect
